Plot: In 1917, two children take a photograph, which is soon believed by some to be the first scientific evidence of the existence of fairies.
Title: FairyTale: A True Story
Writer: Albert Ash (story), Tom McLoughlin (story), Ernie Contreras (story), Ernie Contreras (screenplay)
Actors: Harvey Keitel, Jason Salkey, Peter O'Toole, Lara Morgan
